虎のサーキットトレ、安芸キャンプ名物に！？ファンの反応も上々

06 Nov 2019

　「阪神秋季キャンプ」（５日、安芸）
　ファンも喜んで一石二鳥！第２クール初日の午前中に、キャンプ地の敷地全体を使ったサーキットトレーニングが行われた。
　設定は、サブグラウンドで体幹強化など複数のトレーニングを行った後、出店が並ぶ坂道へ。メイン球場のバックスクリーン後方を通り、三塁側スタンド上部の通路で折り返す１周１・１キロのコース。一人２周。１周のノルマは７分に設定された。
　サブグラウンドに入れないファンは坂道に並び、普段は遠くにいる選手が目の前で息を切らす姿に興奮。写真を撮り、声援や拍手を送る姿もあった。
　矢野監督にとっては体力、精神力を鍛え「ファンを喜ばせる」という方針も実現したトレーニングとなった。「ファンの人が喜んでくれるようなトレーニングになったらうれしい。（選手間の）競争というか、そういう気持ちが出たとこもあったと思う」。今後は本数を増やすなど、ハードな内容で行われる予定。ファンの反応も上々だけに“名物トレ”になるかも！？

Tiger circuit training, Aki camp specialty! ? The fan response is also excellent

06 Nov 2019

"Hanshin Autumn Camp" (Aki, 5th)
Fans are happy with two birds with one stone! On the morning of the first day of the second course, circuit training was conducted using the entire campsite site.
≪Set up after going through several trainings such as trunk strengthening in the sub-ground, then going to the slope where the stores are lined up. A course of 1 km and 1 kilometer that passes through the back of the back of the main stadium and folds in the passage above the third base stand. 2 laps per person. The quota for one lap was set at 7 minutes.
フ ァ ン Fans who can't enter the subground line up on the slope, and excitement is seen that a player who is usually far away takes his breath in front of him. Some took pictures and cheered and applauded.
For Yano, it was a training that also realized the policy of “strengthening fans” by strengthening physical strength and mental strength. “I'm glad that it was a training that would make fans happy. I think there was a competition (between athletes) or something like that.” In the future, it will be performed with hard contents such as increasing the number of pieces. The fan's reaction may become a “specialty training” only with great success! ?
